options.comment: Check here whether or not lineInvNumber's match up. If so, update, else, remove and insert new

sql.query:
DELETE FROM charges_enrolments ce
WHERE ce.lineInvNumber NOT IN(:P1) AND ce.chargeId = :P2

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total
FROM charges_enrolments
WHERE lineInvNumber = :P1 /* {{lineInvNumber_forInsert}} */

UPDATE charges_enrolments
SET startofweek = :P1 /* {{startofweek}} */, classId = :P2 /* {{classId}} */, studentid = :P3 /* {{student}} */, classTypeId = :P4 /* {{classType}} */, enrolid = :P5 /* {{id}} */, classDate = :P6 /* {{classDate.formatDate('yyyy-MM-dd')}} */, baseRate = :P7 /* {{baseRate}} */, endisc = :P8 /* {{endisc}} */, ennetrate = :P9 /* {{enNetRate}} */, endiscdescription = :P10 /* {{endiscdescription}} */, endiscrate = :P11 /* {{endiscrate}} */, familydiscountdesc = :P12 /* {{familydiscountdesc}} */, familydiscountrate = :P13 /* {{familydiscountrate}} */, familydiscounttotal = :P14 /* {{familydiscounttotal}} */, enrolsubtotal = :P15 /* {{enrolsubtotal}} */, debuggerstatus = 'Updated Charge'
WHERE lineInvNumber = :P16 /* {{lineInvNumber_forInsert}} */
